name: @safe-global/api-kit
description: SDK that facilitates the interaction with the Safe Transaction Service API

scripts.test:web3: export HARDHAT_NETWORK=sepolia && export ETH_LIB=web3 && nyc --reporter=lcov testing-kit test 'tests/endpoint/*.test.*'
scripts.test:ethers: export HARDHAT_NETWORK=sepolia && export ETH_LIB=ethers && nyc --reporter=lcov testing-kit test 'tests/endpoint/*.test.*'
scripts.test:viem: export HARDHAT_NETWORK=sepolia && export ETH_LIB=viem && nyc --reporter=lcov testing-kit test 'tests/endpoint/*.test.*'
scripts.test:ci:web3: export HARDHAT_NETWORK=sepolia && export ETH_LIB=web3 && nyc --reporter=lcov testing-kit test 'tests/e2e/*.test.*'
scripts.test:ci:ethers: export HARDHAT_NETWORK=sepolia && export ETH_LIB=ethers && nyc --reporter=lcov testing-kit test 'tests/e2e/*.test.*'
scripts.test:ci:viem: export HARDHAT_NETWORK=sepolia && export ETH_LIB=viem && nyc --reporter=lcov testing-kit test 'tests/e2e/*.test.*'
scripts.build: yarn unbuild && yarn build:esm && yarn build:cjs && yarn build:types

author: Safe (https://safe.global)
